name: The Scorpion Kings Temple
description:
The Scorpion Kings Temple

Main Menu

The game is set in the jungle and you are tasked with recovering the golden sword of Amun Ra. Battle through the many vermin and enemies out to stop you! Finally face the Scorpion King to claim the sword, if you can...

Made with:

-Game Maker Studio 2 for HTML5

Controls:

-Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

-Shooting - Space Bar

Credits:

-This game was made for JimJam April 6 - 8 2018.

-This game Jam was sponsored by Tim Ruswick

-OpenGameArt.org

Freesound.org

-Sithjester

-BFXR

-Affinity Designer
